Description:
Flexible Family Lifestyle in a Premier Location

Neighboring Park Tree Reserve and ideally located within close proximity of local shops including Croydon Hills Milk Bar, McAdam Square and highly regarded schools such as Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd Primary, Croydon Hills Primary, this home offers a location that is second to none.

Presenting a character filled wrap around verandah this home is packed with quality features including electric heating, refrigerated/split system cooling, security system, automated sprinkler system, double glazed windows, eco LED lights, 5000L water tank, double garage with an automatic door and additional driveway space providing ample car accommodation.
